name: Skill Drive (Demo)
description:
This is a free gameplay demo for Skill Drive,  a complete Unity project available at the Unity Asset Store.

DESCRIPTION

In this 3D arcade racing game you need to collect all blue cubes with your car. Sounds pretty easy right?! But you've only got 10 seconds to get each level done! Are you able to master all 15 levels?

TECHNICAL DETAILS

The game has been developed for desktop and tested on Windows. It supports keyboard and gampad input, setup with Unity's new Input System and uses Cinemachine and Post Processing to create nice and smooth effects.
